25 February 2018

LIVE! Episode on Delphi Games and Graphics Engines

by Jim McKeeth

Join Craig, David, and Jim as they discuss Delphi powered Games and Graphics engines LIVE!

[embed]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TkBKItOcFrk&rel=0[/embed]

Live Tuesday, February 27th, 2018 at 12 PM Central Standard Time

  • Craig's Dark Glass project and YouTube channel
  • Drez.games
  • Pascal Game Development community
  • Quad-Games with the Quad-Engine, Blast-Off game and Live Stream
  • Zen GL game engine
  • Castle Game Engine on GitHub and Patreon
  • JEDI-SDL
  • StoneQuest game and YouTube channel
  • Benjamin Rosseaux's Delphi header generators for Vulkan and others
  • EFGs Delphi Graphics Library
  • Graphics32 on GitHub
